item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, March 23, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Crabtime: Zig's Comptime in Rust (55 points | 11 comments)

8. Don't Be Afraid Of Types (19 points | 20 comments)
9. AI is useless, but it is our best bet for the future (2 points | 1 comment)
10. Haiku loves Nvidia (porting Nvidia GPU driver) (21 points | 7 comments)
11. How a glitch in an online survey replaced the word ‘yes’ with ‘forks’ (54 points | 11 comments)
12. Custom VC-Focused Emacs Functions to Enhance My Git Workflow (3 points | 3 comments)

14. Optimizing by 170,000% by not being silly (3 points | 1 comment)
15. What influences developers' trust in adopting AI-assisted coding tools? (2 points | 3 comments)
16. Improved ways to operate a rude crawler (11 points | 1 comment)
17. When you deleted /lib on Linux while still connected via ssh (20 points | 5 comments)

20. Microsoft Proposes "Hornet" Security Module For The Linux Kernel (13 points | 8 comments)

24. Chunking attacks on Tarsnap (and others) (29 points | 5 comments)
